summary: REQ-46 and REQ-48 appear implemented: version markers updated to 59 in the specified files and a new Version 59 deployment guide was added under frontend/docs with the requested verification checks, commands, and smoke-test checklist. REQ-47 (actual production deployment success on IC) cannot be confirmed/implemented via the provided code diff; the diff only adds documentation/scripts, not evidence of a successful `dfx deploy --network ic` or live endpoint verification. The diff also includes substantial unrelated frontend feature/UI changes beyond a version-promotion scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy Version 59 to the Internet Computer production network so the live canisters serve the Version 59 build.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows documentation and a helper script referencing `dfx deploy --network ic`, but provides no evidence that production deployment was performed successfully or that live canisters/endpoints were verified (these are operational outcomes, not implemented changes).

hallucinated_features.description: Large set of frontend application/UI/behavior changes (routing/pages/nav/auth shell/dashboard error handling, React Query hooks including new medication management hooks, design system/print CSS, Tailwind theme changes, resident mock data/utilities, etc.) unrelated to a version-marker update/promotion.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists non-goals as implementing new product features or UI changes unrelated to the Version 59 production promotion; these modifications go far beyond updating version markers and adding deployment documentation.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new production deployment helper script for Version 59 (`frontend/scripts/deploy-ic-v59.sh`).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-46/47/48 (REQ-48 asks for documentation under `frontend/docs/`; it does not request adding scripts).

hallucinated_features.description: Modified/added deployment scripts README content under `frontend/scripts/README.md`.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; REQ-48 only requires a Version 59 deployment doc under `frontend/docs/`.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated `project_state.json` summary/content describing broader product work (Maui Lane Care Home app copying Moritz app) unrelated to version promotion.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the version marker update or deployment documentation requirements; also suggests scope creep beyond the stated non-goals.
